section.p: (1)Install the Monitoring Service with a Metrics Agent and a Log Agent required for self-monitoring
(2)Install OpenStack Extensions - Metrics Agent on OpenStack node where OpenStack service to be monitored is running
(3)Install OpenStack Extensions - Log Agent on OpenStack node where OpenStack service to be monitored is running
(4)Install OpenStack Extensions - Horizon Plugin to integrate the Monitoring Service into the OpenStack cloud/platform
(5)Configure OpenStack Keystone to integrate the Monitoring Service with OpenStack Keystone
